vision_analysis.question_text: Which of the following most improve your opinion of Renewable gas?
clickable_elements: Renewable gasses will be blended into the existing gas network which avoids the cost and hassles of changing appliances for years to come
Renewable gas is created from renewable sources like solar, wind and organic waste
Renewable gas is a sustainable zero-emission source of energy
Renewable gasses can be stored within the existing gas network for use at any time, including when the sun is not shining, or the wind is not blowing
Renewable gas uses existing infrastructure, which can reduce the need to invest billions of dollars into new infrastructure (e.g. new electricity grids or too many battery & wind farms etc)
Renewable gas enables customers to continue to choose and use gas appliances -for cooking, hot water and heating
Renewable gas can help Australia achieve its zero-emission target more efficiently
There is a future for gas, one that transitions to renewable, zero-carbon sources over time
Renewable gas is a clean, reliable and responsive renewable energy option

automation.question_text: Which of the following most improve your opinion of Renewable gas?
